module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Our payments platform comes with an exclusive reduced fee offer of 0.9% on Debit Card/Prepaid Card/Credit Card (VISA, Mastercard, Maestro) transactions, and 0.5% fees on Rapid Transfer transactions. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep your store up-to-date: benefit from the latest features and improvements available.Protect your store: stay up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Optimize your SEO: enhance your search results on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc.) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.additional_description: Synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial: https://help.sendinblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001123645-PrestaShop-1-7-Set-up-the-plugin

module.name: productcomments
module.description: Allow users to post reviews on your products and/or rate them based on specific criteria
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Allow users to post reviews on your products and/or rate them based on specific criteria.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: increase your conversion rate with a comments section, helpful to reassure and show your visitors your store is trustworthy.Improve your SEO: search engines will use it to discover new content.Rich snippets: enrich your search engine results by displaying rating stars on your store - it allows you to gain visibility, and therefore increase your traffic.

module.name: pscleaner
module.description: PrestaShop helps you remove your catalog, orders and customers data in one go
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PrestaShop helps you remove your catalog, orders and customers data in one go.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Delete databases in one click: it helps clean your store and its data by allowing you the suppression of all data.

module.description: Protect image by watermark
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect image by watermark.

module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Handle your stock: keep an eye on your out-of-stock products and be ahead of your needs.

module.description_full: Enrich your stats, display the pages requested by your visitors that could not be found.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Prevent technical issue: people attempting to access pages of your catalog but could not find them, resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors, can be useful to detect potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.name: trackingfront
module.description: Your business is wider than just this store, gathering affiliates around? Enable them to access their own statistics so that you can both grow faster, hand in hand
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Your business is wider than just this store, gathering affiliates around? Enable them to access their own statistics so that you can both grow faster, hand in hand.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Increase your visibility: manage your affiliates and traffic to be reachable and improve your SEO.

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: A trusted and familiar payment solution which allows customers to use one familiar login to identify themselves and transact on your site
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A trusted and familiar payment solution which allows customers to use one familiar login to identify themselves and transact on your site. Amazon Pay can help you build, maintain loyal customers and as a result increase your sales.
module.additional_description: Amazon Pay can help you to:Build customer loyaltyAcquire new customersIncrease conversionReduce fraudOptimize the mobile checkout experience Sign-up now for Amazon Pay!

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Connect with your visitors and reassure them about secure payment, free shipping or returns
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Connect with your visitors and reassure them about secure payment, free shipping or returns.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Establish a trust relationship: customizable and responsive information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing on your online shop.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Add a banner on your homepage to display sales or new products in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add a banner on your homepage to display sales or new products in a visual and friendly way.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Address specific customers: you can create a banner for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Promote seasonal offers: it will help your customers to feel like shopping your products.Highlight an important section of your store: your visitors will probably pay attention to and focus more on your catalog.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop and see available subcategories.Picture the category tree: it is very useful to navigate between category and subcategory pages.Facilitate the search: help your visitors to easily find the items they want. Indeed, they just have to look at the right place, and they will spot it quickly!

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Let your customers know how to reach you, display contact information on your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Let your customers know how to reach you, display contact information on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Stay available: your customers will love to know when and how they can join you, it is always useful!Establish a trust relationship: the contact section of your store is helpful to reassure and show your visitors that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Connect with your customers: create an easy purchasing environment for your clients to make them feel like going back.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Give your visitors extra information, display a customized block of content on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give your visitors extra information, display a customized block of content on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Build your brand image: adding text to your pages allows you to focus your customers on specific aspects of your brand.Address specific customers: you can create content for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Strengthen your content strategy: provide information and target keywords to reach best search engine results.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Handle your customers: retrieve data on your subscribers in one place with email address, main information, etc.Create special offers: offer your subscribers a voucher to stimulate their shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_featuredproducts
module.description: Pick a category and highlight its items, enhance customer experience with a lively homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Pick a category and highlight its items, enhance customer experience with a lively homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Increase your visibility: select what category you want to focus attention on and display a few of its items on your front office.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items to boost your sales.

module.name: ps_imageslider
module.description: Add sliding images to your homepage to welcome your visitors in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add sliding images to your homepage to welcome your visitors in a visual and friendly way.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Enhance customer experience: create a lively homepage with both a professional look and your own style! - Promote seasonal offers: it will help your customers to feel like purchasing your products.Highlight an important section of your store: your visitors will probably pay attention to and focus more on your catalog.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.Address specific customers: you can create a banner for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.

module.name: ps_mainmenu
module.description: Make it easy for your visitors to find their way on your store, select the right link and turn it into a menu item
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make it easy for your visitors to find their way on your store, select the right link and turn it into a menu item.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop while keeping an eye on its menu.Increase your visibility: select content and keywords you want to highlight and focus on your SEO.

module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Increase your digital strategy: let your customers know where to reach you and make them feel like sharing your content.Gain visibility on your social media: select on what channels you want to focus attention on and target your content according to this.

module.name: ps_socialfollow
module.description: Facebook, Twitter, let your customers know where to follow you and increase your community
module.author: PrestaShop

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give more visibility to your content/static pages (CMS, external pages, or else), where you want and when you want, to make your visitors feel like shopping on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items to boost your sales.Establish a trust relationship: customizable and responsive information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.

module.description_full: Make your everyday life easier, handle mail alerts about stock and orders, addressed to you as well as your customers.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you recall stock and orders to your visitors, it will stimulate their shopping.Handle your stock: keep an eye on the products that can soon be out-of-stock.

module.name: ps_reminder

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Offer your customers a quick follow-up with daily customized emails to send.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: recapture lost sales with reminders on canceled carts.Reward your customers: send vouchers when they reach a given amount of orders, validate their first order or to make them come back on your store!

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments.​Install Stripe's plugin on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account, and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Create your Stripe account in 10 minutes and immediately start accepting payments via Visa, MasterCard and American Express (no additional contract/merchant ID needed from your bank)Improve your conversion rate by offering a seamless payment experience to your customers: Stripe lets you host the payment form on your own pages, without redirection to a bank third-part pageKeep your fraud under control thanks to customizable 3D-Secure and Stripe Radar, our suite of anti-fraud toolsHundreds of third-part integrations to enrich your Stripe set-up (invoicing, SMS...) This plugin fully relies on Stripe.js to generate a token that gets used to create the charge with Stripe: sensitive data will never hit your servers, maintaining a high level of security and preventing you from a heavy PCI/DSS certification.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your visual identity or type of business
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your visual identity or type of business.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Easy import purchased modules: import the zip file into the module’s configuration interface and you’re all set! You can use your new email template immediately.Manage your email content: content and translations automatically retrieved for traditional transaction emails (more than 30 templates).Access your emails in one-click: store default email templates in PrestaShop and purchased templates.

module.name: mailchimppro
module.description: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. We make innovative, beautiful products that empower you to grow the way you want to
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. We make innovative, beautiful products that empower you to grow the way you want to. Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go.
module.additional_description: See detailed campaign reports—from engagement to ROI—so you can sell more stuff.Sync and segment your list, then send targeted campaigns based on things like products purchased and amount spent over time.Create abandoned cart emails, send product recommendations, and more.Follow up with, delight, and re-engage your customers using pre-built customer lifecycle automations.Design and send personalized transactional messages—like shipping notifications, invoices, and more—directly through Mailchimp.

module.name: ps_googleanalytics
module.description: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Analyze your visitors' behavior: be able to retrace all the stops your customers take on the road to action on your store.Gain new customers: read this data as a measurable way to improve your campaigns and reach new audiences.

module.name: ns8csp
module.description: NS8 helps you minimize the impact of fraud on your business without blocking valid customers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: NS8 helps you minimize the impact of fraud on your business without blocking valid customers.
module.additional_description: NS8 is a comprehensive fraud prevention platform that combines behavioral analytics, real-time scoring, and global monitoring to help merchants of all sizes optimize order processing and minimize risk. Built on the Protect API, this app integrates directly into NS8's platform and allows merchants to begin fighting fraud within minutes. Score users in real timeNS8 analyzes all visitors and transactions in real time, providing a single score that assesses the fraud risk posed by each user. The score is an actionable data point that can be incorporated into a variety of customizable workflows. If a user’s score is suspiciously low, you can investigate their order before a chargeback occurs. Automate your workflowNS8’s automated tools allow merchants to escalate order investigation and request additional verification for suspicious orders. Create custom thresholds to designate user risk and reduce the labor involved in manual review and shipping lead times.

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons

module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads on Google (Google Shopping + Dynamic Remarketing)
module.description: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network.
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Google Shopping campaigns: We create, manage and optimize your Google Shopping campaigns.Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Google Ads app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right customers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.name: ps_mbo
module.displayName: PrestaShop Marketplace in your Back Office

module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: viabill
module.description: ViaBill provides a seamless financing solution for thousands of merchants and customers across the world
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ViaBill provides a seamless financing solution for thousands of merchants and customers across the world. We’re increasing average order sizes, providing low transaction costs and putting the customer in focus so they can get what they want, when they want it; all of which benefits, you, the merchant.
module.additional_description: ViaBill enables you to provide seamless financing to your customers. Allow your customers to buy now and pay in 4 equal monthly payments without any interest or fees. Convert the “maybe laters” into buyers, while increasing your average-order-value by 32.7%. We’ll handle both fraud and credit risk, while you’ll get paid right away.

badge.label: Average cart: Partner of the year

module.name: upsmodule

module.description: Easily Integrate for free the UPS Shipping and UPS Access Point™: Official Module into your store
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Easily Integrate for free the UPS Shipping and UPS Access Point™: Official Module into your store. Obtain guaranteed and reliable delivery services to thousands of convenient UPS Access Point locations or to home/office/commercial addresses.
module.additional_description: Available for free.Allows merchants to offer a wide range of delivery options in terms of speed (Standard, Express etc.) and multiple delivery location options (pick up at a convenient UPS Access Point location or delivery to your customers' home/office address).Easy to configure: With a single module, merchants can offer their customers a large network of UPS Access Point locations in Europe and North America.

module.name: klarnapaymentsofficial
module.description: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0.7 and any future versions, also include Klarna’s On-Site Messaging Feature.
module.additional_description: Klarna Payments enhances your current checkout, offering flexible payment options that empower your customers, giving them choice to pay directly, by invoice or using financing. The Klarna products are Pay now, Pay later and Financing, and all increase conversions and take the friction out of shopping. And that’s not all. No matter which Klarna option shoppers choose, you get paid when that goods ship. The On-Site Messaging feature continues the smooth journey, increasing risk-free sales through tailored messaging and showing your customers available financing options while they’re still shopping. Advertising the ability to pay later, before checkout improves sales.  On-Site Messaging provides customized messaging ranging from banners promoting your partnership with Klarna and availability of payment options, to personalized promotions on product or cart pages. Customers are identified from their first interaction, so the shopping experience can be tailored to suit their needs. Klarna delivers:- Global Compliance- Absorbs all credit and fraud risk- Local support across Europe Your benefits:- Increase in conversions and order value- Reach a new audience- Always get paid To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Payments, sign up here.

module.name: starshipit
module.description: Starshipit is a powerful tool that automates the process of fulfiling and delivering orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Starshipit is a powerful tool that automates the process of fulfiling and delivering orders. With features like live rates at checkout, shipping labels, and branded tracking Starshipit lets you take control of your PrestaShop order fulfilment.
module.additional_description: Save time on fulfillment - import orders from multiple sales channels with write-back into one easy to manage dashboard. Supports multiple couriers & eCommerce channels.Reduce shipping costs - live rates at checkout, batch print labels, and order manifests make domestic and international shipping easy.Print labels - use our windows app or web app (single or batch print) with full support for return labels direct to your thermal or A4 printer.Improve customer engagement - use branded tracking pages and customised shipping notifications to upsell and keep the customer notified of their order status.

module.name: paymentcloud
module.description: Credit Card Processing with PaymentCloud + PrestaShop's Back Office Integration. The all in one payment solution for ecommerce
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Credit Card Processing with PaymentCloud + PrestaShop's Back Office Integration. The all in one payment solution for ecommerce.
module.additional_description: PaymentCloud's Back office Payment Module offers the following benefits: Accept Credit Card Payments through PrestaShop's Back OfficeWe provide the fastest way to accept payments through our back-office integration with PrestaShop. Accept all major credit and debit card, including: Visa, MasterCard, Discover, DinersClub, JCB, UnionPay. eCommerce & High Risk ExpertsPaymentCloud is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both merchant account and secure payment gateway checkout. Chargeback Support High-Risk/eCommerce/Recurring billing experts with access to chargeback management and support. Live customer service 24/7

module.name: acutrackauthtoken
module.description: Acutrack is an eCommerce fulfillment company specializing in book printing & DVD/USB duplication that allows you to fulfill directly to your customers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Acutrack is an eCommerce fulfillment company specializing in book printing & DVD/USB duplication that allows you to fulfill directly to your customers. Our solutions have created true value to our customers for over 25 years
module.additional_description: Acutrack is a technology-driven, experienced business partner. With logistics center on both coasts of the USA, and a powerful print fulfillment service, we serve as a one-stop logistic center for your business needs! Reliable PartnerWhen it comes to your inventory, customers, and orders, you want a partner who has a strong track record and is transparent in its dealings. With 25-years of experience, Acutrack is a reliable partner. Don't just take our word for it! Check out Acutrack reviews on Trustpilot. Book Fulfillment Made EasyAcutrack's comprehensive suite of book fulfillment and distribution services helps businesses deliver their books directly to consumers (B2C) or to retail and other marketplaces like Amazon (B2B) etc.Print small or large runs, using offset or digital technology to meet your forecastTeam of experts in graphic design, print, kitting & packagingWidest range of book trim size & binding options Fulfillment driven by TechnologyAcutrack seamlessly integrates with Prestashop and over 100 other eCommerce platforms. Acutrack delivers an error-free solution to you and your customers. with An online dashboard that provides 24 x 7 access and A strong API support,  Unparalleled Customer ServiceDedicated and personalized supportConsultative business partner Full transparency

module.name: shipstation
module.description: ShipStation is the leading web-based shipping solution that helps ecommerce retailers import, organize, and ship orders quickly and easily—wherever you sell, however you ship
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ShipStation is the leading web-based shipping solution that helps ecommerce retailers import, organize, and ship orders quickly and easily—wherever you sell, however you ship.
module.additional_description: Connect to more customers and more sales channelsShipStation can connect you to even more customers through our growing list of over 100 different stores, shopping carts and marketplaces – more than any other shipping application.Get the best courier ratesCompare real-time rates and delivery times for courier and automatically select the best courier for each shipment based on cost and delivery time. You can use our negotiated rates or link to your own rates if they are better.Access ShipStation anywhere, anytimeManage and ship orders, check reports, communicate with customers and receive push notifications right from your phone or tablet.Automate tasks to save timeShipStation automation rules give you incomparable order and shipping automation options. Automate product lists, attributes, filters, presets, tags, rules, auto-routing for fulfillment and more.Provide your customers a branded shipping experienceCreate your own custom emails, packing slips, shipping labels, tracking page, and returns portal featuring your company brand, colors, social media icons and messaging.International shipping simplifiedShipStation makes going global a snap. Get exclusive worldwide benefits like deep discounts and easy customs forms and other international documentation.Receive customized analytics and reportsWe make your decision-making easy with detailed analysis and reporting of operations, customer engagement, sales trends, customer behavior, and product inventory recommendations.

module.name: fulfillmentbridge
module.description: Your one-stop solution for PrestaShop global logistics. Efficient, fast and affordable global fulfillment solutions with added love for PrestaShop e-commerce
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your one-stop solution for PrestaShop global logistics. Efficient, fast and affordable global fulfillment solutions with added love for PrestaShop e-commerce.  Picking, packing, shipping, tracking, returns, warehousing, import, export and more….
module.additional_description: What You Can Do With the Fulfillment Bridge + PrestaShop Addon:Easily manage inventory and shipping on multiple sales channels.Cut delivery times when shipping to customers via a global multi-warehouse network.Eliminate complexity with a truly end-to-end order management system.Always be in the know with real-time inventory management synching across multiple warehouses and multiple sales channels.Save money and access discounted shipping rates normally reserved for uber-volume sellers.Never have to track down a package for a customer again, with the help of a dedicated brand manager all your current logistics hassles can become a distant memory.Optimized return management, reverse logistics can be easier than you think when you are partnered with a fulfillment provider with the tech and global warehousing resources you get with Fulfillment Bridge.

module.name: cmcommerce
module.description: High-performing ecommerce marketing made simple. Automate your e-commerce marketing with out-of-the box recipes and visual product reviews. Up to 30-days Free Trial
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: High-performing ecommerce marketing made simple. Automate your e-commerce marketing with out-of-the box recipes and visual product reviews. Up to 30-days Free Trial. Launch Promotion of 30% discount for 6 Months.
module.additional_description: We will help you send better, smarter emails that will grow your brand and increase your sales. Trusted by more than 20,000 entrepreneurs and eCommerce businesses all over the world, CM Commerce combines powerful ecommerce marketing with user-generated content tools to engage your customers and build trust in your brand. How does it work? ●  Seamless PrestaShop integration.Instantly sync all of your customer and order data to dynamically build up-to-date and accurate customer profiles and segments.●  Take the stress out of marketing with ready-to-go automation recipes.Easily set up customized emails that welcome new sign-ups, nudge people who abandoned their carts, upsell with personalized receipts, and target customers based on their preferences and behavior.●  Never send an irrelevant email again.Our powerful segmentation gives you access to all of your customer’s purchase, demographic, preference, and engagement data.●  Build brand trust with real customer reviews.With the ability to upload photos and reviews, your customers can become your biggest advocates. Feature their compelling stories on your site and in your emails. It’s the power of social proof at your fingertips.
